channel.title: [UPDATED] ApocalypsePvP - Epic PvP source! [UPDATED]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Apocalypse.png[/img] This is an amazing new server with great features!
It is 24\7 hosted with VPS!
Features include:
[ul][li]24\7 VPS Hosted[/li] [li]All gs specs 100% perfect[/li] [li]Perfect Veng with lunar spellbook[/li] [li]Amazing Kills Exchange rewards[/li] [li]Proper Dragon arrows models[/li] [li]Proper Dragon Bolts (e) models[/li] [li]Perfect Dclaw Spec/Anim[/li] [li]New Run Animation[/li] [li]New Walk Animation[/li] [li]New Dance Animation[/li] [li]ALL Skillcape emotes perfect[/li] [li]A custom quest[/li] [li]New donar abilities - Spec restore and Full restore[/li] [li]Lock Exp and Fix Barrows on npc right click[/li] [li]Combat rings (i) for donars[/li] [li]Arcane stream necklace - Donars[/li] [li]Staff of light - Donars[/li] [li]Perfect Sara Sword spec[/li] [li]Perfect Anchor Spec[/li] [li]New bank[/li] [li]Perfect Vls and Stat specials[/li] [li]Items Kept on death interface[/li] [li]Equipment Stats interface[/li] [li]New range/mage prayers work[/li] [li]Much more and more to come![/li] [li]Webclient Added[/li] [list] [li]Working skills added: Thieving Woodcutting Fishing Mining Crafting Firemaking Cooking Smithing[/li] [/list]
New features added! Skilling: All skills were completely removed from this source, so they were completely re-added by me:
Added new dragon claw spec formula - very close to real runescapes:
[IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/New1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Skillcape.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new5-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new4-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new3-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb418/johnyboy422/thieveftw75-99.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new6-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/new9.jpg[/img] To come:
[s]Crafting Updates - I plan to make cutting a gem give you the cut gem, and allow you to create the necklaces the proper way.[/s] [finished for amulets]
Herblore Fletching [s]Smithing[/s] Hopeufully agility Maybe farming Maybe Runecrafting Maybe Slayer
Credits: Demise, Me [/center][/ul]

item.title: [UPDATED] ApocalypsePvP - Epic PvP source! [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:41, topic:364796”][quote author=jal knight link=topic=461002.msg3405735#msg3405735 date=1290298118]
lol I love all the flamers. I agree that edgeville’s banks are pretty cool.
Good job
[/quote]
Thanks

this is nice, though the name is “pvp” yet you have skills in them, unless your just saying that they work :o

It was originally strictly pvp, but I got so many requests for skilling, so I decided to start coding it in.[/quote]
i see, what im trying to say is, change the name or people will eventually find a stupid way to flame you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

I came back to this thread finding that the development is going along nice. I’m proud of you mate, congratulations on your recent updates, and hope the rest of it goes well.

Thanks:) I just finished cooking - I made it a lot better. I also made my crafting system more like real rs. not 100% because it doesnt have the amulet mold and such, but its fairly close. It has enchanting, stringing, cutting gems, etc. (speaking on amulet crafting. Rings, dhides and all not yet started)
